item.dc:creator: @Cbot Cbot
item.description:
@Cbot wrote:

[quote=“Cain_”][quote author=Cbot link=topic=398098.msg3007041#msg3007041 date=1256489387]

It is very healthy

Pretty sure it’s equally as healthy as not slicing off a piece of your skin.

this.

There is no evidence out there to support the claim that genital mutilation is good for you. Even if it was, parents should not have the right to mutilate their baby’s genitals, it should be the child’s choice later in life.

I’d rather be cut as a baby then being cut at an age where I can remember it…

Also, I think this thread went a bit off track from the main topic?
[/quote]
…therefore the parents should make the decision, because getting it done when they’re older would be, what? Painful? saddening?

Parents should not be allowed to mutilate their child’s genitals, if the child wants it when they’re older, go for it, but the child should have the decision, it should not be up to the parents to figure out whether or not the child would want it when they are older.[/quote]
Okay but discussing the morality of genital mutilation wasn’t what this thread was originally about
and I was trying to get at that.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

[quote=“Davidude, post:12, topic:301781”][quote author=MujaheD link=topic=398098.msg2955577#msg2955577 date=1252807437]

Using “they” is stereotyping, don’t you think?

Your right, I’m sorry.
[/quote]
Using “they” isn’t stereotyping at all. In fact how else could you refer to Jews? By calling them Jews?[/quote]
I say that because not all Jewish people [quote=“MujaheD, post:8, topic:301781”]believe they are superior to everyone & [use] that to justify the murder of thousands of innocent civilians in several wars.[/quote]
By using they, he is saying all do.

[quote=“R.I.P RSC, post:14, topic:301781”][quote author=MujaheD link=topic=398098.msg2955969#msg2955969 date=1252835486]
Tyvm. I didn’t notice that because I was half asleep. To expand on my point, the belief that they are superior to everyone is based on their belief that god created them as the chosen people.
[/quote]

Which is pretty convenient, isn’t it?[/quote]
I’ve yet to hear of a religion that says another group is the “chosen people”

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @MujaheD Radeon
item.description:

Tyvm. I didn’t notice that because I was half asleep. To expand on my point, the belief that they are superior to everyone is based on their belief that god created them as the chosen people.
[/quote]

Which is pretty convenient, isn’t it?

In all fairness, there are some ‘semi-good’ Jews. Heck, some of them want a peaceful approach to the Middle-Eastern situation. But most Jews want to annihilate the Palestinians. And you know what, the Western world is backing them! I’d rather be called a nazi-pig or fascist then to be part of the group that supports those stupid Jews.[/quote]

Some Jews reject the idea of the state of Israel being established before their awaited saviour to come. I remember seeing a you-tube video of a hardcore Jew calling for the implementation of Islamic sharia in Palestine.
